Articles.Content:
Hello, KSP Forum. I was looking around on YouTube and around this site for an answer on how to make an atmospheric planet using Kopernicus. So far, my results have been quite choppy. leaving nothing but a few red rings on where the planet should be.

I have no clue as to why this is happening, so I have provided my script below. Please filter it for any mistakes!

Any help is appreciated! 

@Kopernicus:AFTER[KOPERNICUS]
{
    Body
    {
        name = Stratastrophe
        cacheFile = StratastropheSystem/CacheFiles/Stratastrophe.bin
        flightGlobalsIndex = 10
        Properties
        {
            description = Stratastrophe Description
            radius = 950000 
            geeASL = 1.67 
            rotationPeriod = 27500
            rotates = true 
            tidallyLocked = false
            initialRotation = 0
            isHomeWorld = false
